short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadAssist: Gets you English synonyms or definitions (with parts of Speech)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadAssist helps ease understanding English words or to get synonyms you might wish to know. Students would find it highly beneficial to lookup synonyms or definitions and have a record of such words in ReadAssist tab for future reference. Students looking for enhancing their Vocabulary and understanding of English usage in various web pages they visit would find this Extension highly beneficial. We would be highly delighted to extend the features and support reading for your various needs. Users also get Pronunciation that they could listen.
